courseTitle: Social Determinants of Health: An Interprofessional Approach
courseDescription: The social determinants of health status and health outcomes, including structural, financial and personal influences will be examined. The utility of an interprofessional collaborative approach to health care delivery will be highlighted.
Technical and Digital Skills: Knowledge of health care delivery systems
Interpersonal and Communication Skills: Effective communication within a multidisciplinary team
Problem-Solving and Analytical Skills: Critical evaluation of structural, financial and personal influences on health
Organizational and Leadership Skills: Coordination of interprofessional health care teams
Strategic planning for health care delivery

courseTitle: Social Determinants of Health: An Interprofessional Approach
courseDescription: The social determinants of health status and health outcomes, including structural, financial and personal influences will be examined. The utility of an interprofessional collaborative approach to health care delivery will be highlighted.
Technical and Digital Skills: Research on social determinants of health
Analysis of health care delivery systems
Interpersonal and Communication Skills: Effective communication in a healthcare setting
Problem-Solving and Analytical Skills: Evaluation of structural, financial and personal influences on health outcomes
Critical assessment of health status determinants
Organizational and Leadership Skills: Leadership within an interprofessional healthcare team
